long_description: Keep sticks, stones and sand from getting into your boots when you're backpacking with the lightweight REI Trail Light gaiters. Supplex nylon material has a Durable Water Repellent coating to help shed water from splashing puddles and light rain showers; provides UPF 30 protection. Removable instep cord is easily replaceable. Gaiters are easy to get on and off with lightweight rip-and-stick front closures. Double-layer scuff guards protect against abrasion in high-wear areas.
short_description: Keep sticks, stones and sand from getting into your boots when you're backpacking with the lightweight REI Trail Light gaiters.
